text: It doesn't work on kiwi Android browser
It's a very good start. I'm looking forward to seeing where this project goes. For people like me who use Ungoogled Chromium, this is a must-have!

Hello, is there a solution to the error I get when using Edge browser?

"Couldn't get bookmark properties URL is invalid or webpage data could
its work but i disable it and when i enable it is delete my bookmarks
Only works on old Android phones. I have a Galaxy Note 20, three years old and its not old enough. Uninstalling. Useless.
Best browser synchronisation tool!
I strongly recommend adding a Chinese version. Thanks.
Everytime i want to add anything to bookmark i get sync error. I lost half a year of bookmarks by that.

Read all your bookmarks by DEFAULT. Which means sync replaces ALL of them. So if you want a link to appear in your another browser you MUST have all other bookmarks the same!! 
Otherwise, sync will replace all the bookmarks with the ones you first install the app
My bookmarks are gone now, thank you!
Best part about it is that is encrypted and can be selfhosted.
This is excellent but you do need to understand what you're doing before going ahead. It does give warnings. I've used it for years and not lost anything so far. Thanks.

CHROME >>> EDGE sync worked flawlessly despite not being officially supported, caveats to follow:
1. ALWAYS BACKUP your stuff before installing any extension...duh!
2. WARNING: reading other reviews it seems people think it will merge the new bookmarks into the old bookmarks and this is NOT the case you are copying from your first installed instance Thats this browser right here you are about to install on and create your sync ID. To whatever target you want to move your bookmarks to then you... Show more

You lose data. A big no no!.  You lose data in a way backup can't really help. Sometimes you just lose a few links sometime entire folders. You don't even know you lost it until after several days when you look for that link. Even if you take regular backups. It is too cumbersome to figure out which got lost where and trying to do a recovery. It shouldn't be hard to design something that will not lose data. If in doubt, dont sync and throw a warning and let the user decide.
I'm hoping for something that I can add a few bookmarks to, not something that automatically reads all my junk.

syncs all my bookmarks across all me devices and web browsers (I use more than a few). I especially like how it integrates with the bookmarks bar and works as per normal. I used my main browser first to sync then turn of browser sync so it only syncs through app, after this I install extension on all web browsers and mobile app, it just works. well done to all people involved in this project.

Great synce browser in market, but there is BUG it's duplicate bookmark many time got a lot of same bookmark in toolsbar

Please solve it.

THANKS.

Ditched the extension as it currently only supports bookmarks sync.
So no sync for opened tabs or tab groups. Also no support for Opera browser.
I will come back eventually if these features have been added.
Fails to sync regularly on Mac Chrome. Then the Windows chrome machine ends up with duplicate links in favourites bar. Just gave up in the end.
Nice plug-in，But you need a Chinese language

I've been wanting something like this but had no idea it already existed ❤️

Hard to use Edge all the time and then use my phone with Chrome and not have the same stuff.

I hope more things get added like tabs, history, site data, etc.
How to sync? I'm so confused rn

It was a great alternative to the now defunct Xmarks, but it has begun to cause a lot of trouble syncing between Chrome and Firefox, at least on Linux; removing duplicate bookmarks with other extensions makes xBrowserSync overwrite the cleaned-up local bookmarks with the "dirty" online bookmarks.
This process becomes unavoidable, memory-consuming (to the point of OOM, crashing both browsers), and has rendered the extension unusable for me, at the risk of losing previous bookmarks.

It was wel... Show more
This extension isn't worth the time it took to write this review.
Sure you can find other ones that will take your data and all along with them. This is only one that is open source, no identifying info or anything. Just encryption key and sync chain

STAY FAR AWAY FROM THIS EXTENSION IF YOUR BOOKMARKS MEAN ANYTHING TO YOU. This extension utterly and completely destroyed my bookmarks in vivaldi. I DID NOT EVEN HAVE TIME to backup before it deleted everything and replaced it with a tiny fraction of what it used to be. I have been collecting tens of thousands of bookmarks over the past decade. WHERE ARE MY BOOKMARKS. If you do not help me restore them there will be some serious problems for you and your company. Now I have to waste my entire... Show more

The sync worked fantastic and is very fast. Thanks for this extension. The only thing: the order of my bookmarks in the folders changed, so it took me a while to rearrange them but overall a great extension. Thank you for providing it!
Couldn't find the same extension for Edge browse, which is what I wanted to sync to from Chrome.
Yes! This is the one! Finally after all these years I can sync painlessly and without fear between browsers and platforms. Big thanks to the team.

On first inspection it seems to work fine, you don't find out that it's actually a buggy mess until later on when entire folders of bookmarks disappear.  Try and put a bookmark into a folder in Chrome or Edge ?  SYNC ERROR.  OVER AND OVER.  Jump over to firefox and do the same thing ?  No problem.  Jump back to Chrome/Edge and BOOM SYNC ERROR and the entire folder disappears.  These SYNC ERRORS have been happening in various circumstances for YEARS.  There are OPEN ISSUES going back to 2019 a... Show more
The best bookmarks sync application on phone and pc browser. It saves me a lot of time. Thank you! 🤗🤗🤗

I am using it for only few weeks in Chrome, Edge and Firefox. Sometimes when I add new bookmark it duplicates all the bookmarks. Probaly because more than 1 Chrome is running on the PC. This happened already four time during these few weeks. I have to remove it. It brings me total mess in my bookmarks instead of synchronization :-(

This extension this great! 

Unfortunately, according to their FAQ, Apple is being "pissy" with their iOS requirements. As a result, I can't use this extension on my iPhone. I've had bad luck, previously, with Android phones. That is why i now use an iPhone. I've never had good luck with Android tablets, so that's not an option either. At least the extension works on my Linux laptop.

I really wish Apple would get off their "holier than thou" high horse.
It's a great extension!  I use it with Chrome.  I can find any bookmark I've saved.  Thank you to the author for all the time it must have taken to development this extension.

One of the two plugins I install on all of my systems (the other one being lastpass :)). It's a bit problematic recently (06/2021) 'too many connections' error? But works eventually and I can't imagine a day's work without it.
The best bookmark sync. Waiting some options in managment side.
Works perfectly
Awesome !!

I wanted to like this, but the fact that the Update Sync button is disabled (preventing a manual sync) in both Edge and Chrome, and the sync does not happen at 15 minutes or when a browser is closed, leads me elsewhere.
Best thing on browser for linux, now I only need something to sync my passwords, cuz google won't let open source browsers use their api.
Absolutely brilliant. Installed into Chrome and Edge on my Windows PC, followed up on my Android phone and synced perfectly. Far easier and better than any others I've used.
Thank you for developing this. I've been looking for something like this for a long time (coming from delicious and xmarks - rest in peace)

The easy way to test it is to a run Bookmark Cleanup on it. Test if removing duplicates bookmarks and folders in the browser, also deleted them on XBrowserSync. In my case the duplicates regularly came back due to XBrowserSync, sync failed. Yandex Browser, json backup available for testing.

I really like this extension, but I have one question. Brave Browser also has a similar sync feature, how is this different from Brave in privacy apart from file hosting? because I want to know if this has an advantage over Brave in security and privacy. Thanks!
So far so good I will donate for such a good free solution
really good
Love that it's open-source, and privacy conscious. Works great! Appreciate all the work!
Very useful

spectacular extension!
easy and intuitive to use!

Thanks for your great work!
I was searching like this for years.
Deleting bookmarks and folders for no reason! Too bad it looked like a nice add-on but I can't risk losing my previous 2,000 bookmarks

This extension is awesome, but it enters the endless sync loop on my Chromebook. I'm using the Chrome browser obviously so I don't know why this is happening.

EDIT: I've been using this extension / service for a while now and it works really well. There are others like it but this one is for sure the most presentable.

Works on Firefox and Chromium but I can't get it to work on Brave browser. It synced my bookmarks at first but not it's saying I might have a corrupt profile. I deleted the profile along with all the config folders in my home directory but it still won't work.
Doesnt work on Brave broswer, giving error "broken bookmark structure"

Great Extension, easy to use! Keep your Sync ID in a password manager to ensure you don't lose it. This program is quick and very impressive! The expansion of installers for different device's and OS' was promised and delivered, again very impressive. Again Highly Recommended.
Amazing concept!
30 Minutes of effort, no results - Garbage!  Couldn't get it to work with Brave.

xBS has a potential if the developer listens to users. It clearly lacks two powerful features, which have been requested repeatedly — (1) merging bookmarks between devices/browsers instead of overwriting them and (2) command-based syncronisation when a user can download and upload bookmarks from/to the sync server (two separate buttons maybe?). Thanks!
please make "Already got a sync ID" bigger, great ext
Great! Keep going!

Thanks a lot for this Service!,
it's very sad that sharing bookmarks does not work.
For example, we expect to
1) select all bookmarks which are tagged by a keyword
2) and then share it to someone (e.g. by E-Mail) or to another xBrowserSync User

Very unstable. I'm running my own server (via Docker) and every few weeks there is sync issue where part of the bookmarks is missing and I'm forced to create a new sync account otherwise I cannot upload what I'm restoring from the backup.

Since xBoolmarks sync project was stopped, I was searching for a similar tool to sync my bookmarks without having logged in into browsers' built-in systems. This is (almost) exactly what I wanted. Anonymous, simple, lightweight. Would like just a little more compatibility with old versions of Chromium (65, for instance), where it tries to start syncing whithout any result. Other browsers (newer Chromium, Firefox) work just fine.

Since chrome bookmark doesn't have a "Bookmarks Menu" item, I think it's better to map "[xbs] Menu" to chrome's "Other bookmarks" because they are both displayed in the first class of the browser menu, and make the "Other Bookmarks" of firefox as a subfolder like "[xbs] Other" of the "Other bookmarks" in Chrome.
Wow! The latest update (v1.5) just made this a 5 star extension for me. Syncs between different browsers are now fast and smooth. Thank you

I'm sure the developer did his best, but syncing from one device's Chrome to another, I may get all the changes, or I may not. Add 6 bookmarks? Might see 6, might see 2. Uninstalled and reinstalled, tried different sync IDs...and of course I usually don't know if it's one of the random times I'm getting stuff dropped, since it usually seems to work fine and I don't check, so any losses then just get synced back to the other machine and I've lost them forever. I finally switched to a competito... Show more
killer for different type of Chromium browser
Excellent. Easy to use. Work smoothly.

The first versions of this extension were a disaster, I lost several bookmarks and had others completely scrambled... The developers did a great job and starting from version 1.5 the product was working as intended. The last version is almost perfect and does a great job synchronizing between different platforms! I highly recommend this. Thank you!
This thing is KILLER! Thanks for making it :)
if you want to loose your bookmarks use this extension
When I installed this months ago, xBrowserSync only supported Chrome. Now that issue is not only fixed, the app has Firefox support! It's a great open-source solution.

Use it to sync between firefox and chrome. Sometimes it becomes unrespondable and sync something that was deleted before. Also miss Force sync option and continuous sync (like push in email services) immediately after changes was made somewhere
The best alternative to Xmarks. Easy to use and works well.

I am very impressed with this quality solution for a challenging problem. xBrowserSync is now one of my "must-have" tools as it helps keep all of my bookmarks organized and synchronized across a high number of different browsers and devices. Big thanks and appreciation to the author for making this available. Great work!
very good！
Stupid app deleted ALL of my bookmarks on Chrome!!! Can't freaking believe it!

I liked the concept.  The main issue is that you can't browse your bookmarks in the organized folders that are currently set up in the browser.  I have to type in the bookmark name to browse it, it makes this extension useless for me. When I have hundreds of bookmarks organized by folders.

Just want to say big thank you to the author.
Looking forward to Firefox extension.
Also, this golang server is easy way to run private API  for those interested - github.com/ishani/xSyn
Refused to sync. Seems I have too many bookmarks. Waste of time. Where is the clear statement HOW MANY bookmarks you are "allowed".
Excellent. Easy to setup. Secure. Cool features. Looking forward to Firefox version!
Works great. Simple.
This is an awesome extension so far, thanks for making it!
